# trss-crumbs

Breadcrumbs help the site visitor navigate between the page they are on and the site homepage by showing a linked folder path. On UCSC websites, breadcrumbs should appear near the page title.

Truss expects breadcrumbs to be an HTML list (`ul` or `ol`) of links. Optionally, the last list item can be the current page.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                         | Type     | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `separator` | `separator` | The visual separator between links. | `string` | `'/'`   |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
